about_the_game:
This is a 3D model about Evraco

Can be used for any *non-commercial* purpose, including Vtuber, and can also be modified

When displaying this model, please provide attribution to the source "WeissGarden"

Contents:

3D model original file: Blender, Unity, vroid

Minecraft skin: X1
